gobblin.metrics

Class GobblinMetricsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.GobblinMetricsRegistry

  • public class GobblinMetricsRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Registry that stores instances of GobblinMetrics identified by an arbitrary string id. The static method getInstance() provides a static instance of this this class that should be considered the global registry of metrics. An application could also instantiate one or more registries to for example separate instances of GobblinMetrics into different scopes.
